<target_code>
Here is the code of MHD_bin_to_hex:
```c
size_t
MHD_bin_to_hex (const void *bin,
                size_t size,
                char *hex)
{
  size_t i;

  for (i = 0; i < size; ++i)
  {
    uint8_t j;
    const uint8_t b = ((const uint8_t *) bin)[i];
    j = b >> 4;
    hex[i * 2] = (char) ((j < 10) ? (j + '0') : (j - 10 + 'a'));
    j = b & 0x0f;
    hex[i * 2 + 1] = (char) ((j < 10) ? (j + '0') : (j - 10 + 'a'));
  }
  return i * 2;
}
```
</target_code>
